channel.title: What would you do if G-Man teleported you to Xen with no guns or HEV suit
channel.description: What would you do? how would you do it? And none of imma pull out my cell and call a cab!!!!! "Shit Verizon Doesnt cover inter-dimensional regions i should have went with AT&T Screw that!!" I wouldnt panic thats why all those guys with HEVS in XEN are dead! Duh.............!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! BTW dont ask XEN for directions to the nearest portal theyre not very nice remeber? (FORGET ABOUT HL2 THEY ARENT NICE OR HELPFUL GOT IT)

item.title: What would you do if G-Man teleported you to Xen with no guns or HEV suit
item.dc:creator: i_am_jesus_here_me_r
item.description:
I would use my newly acquired strength to pick up one of those pointy rocks impale a vortigaunt then eat it which gives you lightning powerz then kill 2 alien grunt and take their hornet guns and then I would have “DUAL HIVEHANDS THAT SHOOT ELECTRIC BEES!”

Read full topic

item.title: What would you do if G-Man teleported you to Xen with no guns or HEV suit
item.dc:creator: nietzschesaurus
item.description:
I would probably suffer extreme tissue damage from beta particles if I didn’t instantly die via lung collapse due to being exposed in a vaccuum.

Just sayin.

Then again if the Gman’s picking me to go into Xen I’m sure he would’ve set it up prior so that I wouldn’t just turn into a bloated purple-green mass of decaying matter as soon as I got there.
